Memunatu Sulemana (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke anọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1977) bụ onye Ghana bụbu onye na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dịka onye na-edebe goolu
Ọ bụ onye otu ụmụ nwanyị mba Ghana.
Na klọb, Sulemana gbara bọọlụ maka Post Ladies na Ghana. Ọ gbara bọọlụ maka Pelican Stars na Nigeria Women Premier League.
Sulemana so n'òtù egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Ghana na afọ 1999 FIFA Women's World Cup, afọ 2003 FIFA Women'S World Cup na 2007 FIFA Women'es World Cup.
